name: RD: Hero In Training
description:
The big day is coming! Soon, the next greatest hero of the generation will make his big debut to the whole world. In this 3D Platformer, take control of RD - 1, a robot built to be a hero. But before all that, its important to test all of his abilities, to make sure everything is working as intended. Its just standard QA Testing.  

Punch, dash, shoot, and jump through different environments to help RD pass the tests. RD is equipped with 3 main abilities: 

  • The Dash Boost: a high speed dash that can help cross large gaps or be used in combat
  • Rocket Arm: a large projectile that locks onto enemies and tracks them
  • Robo-Punch: a quick melee attack to deter foes that get too close. 

High speed action, thrilling combat and huge boss encounters await! RD has 3 tests to pass. Put his parkouring skill to the test in the Movement Trial! Fend off waves of enemies in the Combat Trial! Lastly, overcome an incredible foe in the Final Test.  Pass all the trials and show the whole world what RD is made of.
